attributes.action: Ban the releasing of balloons polluting our world!!!

attributes.background:
https://balloonsblow.org/Education/

LEARN THE ISSUE.

These balloons go from our minds after they disappear from sight.  They then become another factor in the plastic pollution we are struggling with Worldwide.

Look at webpage BALLOONSBLOW.ORG - this explains everything we need to know.
